botan.pubkey.pk_keys

PK Key Types

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

interface PublicKey;
Public Key Base Class.

abstract const @property string algoName();
Get the name of the underlying public key scheme.

Returns:
name of the public key scheme

abstract const size_t estimatedStrength();
Return the estimated strength of the underlying key against the best currently known attack. Note that this ignores anything but pure attacks against the key itself and do not take into account padding schemes, usage mistakes, etc which might reduce the strength. However it does suffice to provide an upper bound.

Returns:
estimated strength in bits

final const OID getOid();
Get the OID of the underlying public key scheme.

Returns:
OID of the public key scheme

abstract const bool checkKey(RandomNumberGenerator rng, bool strong);
Test the key values for consistency.

Params:
RandomNumberGenerator rng rng to use
bool strong whether to perform strong and lengthy version of the test

Returns:
true if the test is passed

abstract const size_t messageParts();
Find out the number of message parts supported by this scheme.

Returns:
number of message parts

abstract const size_t messagePartSize();
Find out the message part size supported by this scheme/key.

Returns:
size of the message parts in bits

abstract const size_t maxInputBits();
Get the maximum message size in bits supported by this public key.

Returns:
maximum message size in bits

abstract const AlgorithmIdentifier algorithmIdentifier();
Returns:
X.509 AlgorithmIdentifier for this key

abstract const Vector!ubyte x509SubjectPublicKey();
Returns:
X.509 subject key encoding for this key object

final const void loadCheck(RandomNumberGenerator rng);
Self-test after loading a key

Params:
RandomNumberGenerator rng a random number generator

interface PrivateKey: botan.pubkey.pk_keys.PublicKey;
Private Key Base Class

abstract const SecureVector!ubyte pkcs8PrivateKey();
Returns:
PKCS #8 private key encoding for this key object

abstract const AlgorithmIdentifier pkcs8AlgorithmIdentifier();
Returns:
PKCS #8 AlgorithmIdentifier for this key Might be different from the X.509 identifier, but normally is not

final const void loadCheck(RandomNumberGenerator rng);
Self-test after loading a key

Params:
RandomNumberGenerator rng a random number generator

final const void genCheck(RandomNumberGenerator rng);
Self-test after generating a key

Params:
RandomNumberGenerator rng a random number generator

interface PKKeyAgreementKey: botan.pubkey.pk_keys.PrivateKey;
PK Secret Value Derivation Key
